column4: hey guys, quick question. What's the best way to share files between *nix boxes over a network? I found out how to setup SFTP folders in gnome, but I know there has to be a way for mounting a remote filesystem as if it were your own.
nfs is probably your best bet, its what i use for the computers on my network

mmmm you may have to install nfs-utils, but otehr than that it should have it
just do "cat /proc/filesystems" and look for nfs
